channel.title: On behalf of Wrench_King
channel.description:
It might not be apparent to some but the server glitched last night, alot of things were messed up in the process, and i witnessed it all myself, chests crashing players, previous blocks placed are gone in random increments, and items missing.
Wrench_King's inventory was glitched and he is unable to login without his client crashing instantly, not minecraft login, the /login command on the server itself.
He has asked me to post this to have his inventory wiped so he can login.
If you do not believe anything glitched, take a look at the chest that is on the bank of the lake in david's empire, crashes the minecraft client whenever you try to open it.

item.title: On behalf of Wrench_King
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:7, topic:393768”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=490953.msg3590253#msg3590253 date=1304559110]

take a look at the chest that is on the bank of the lake in david’s empire

Ty for chest location.

its full of dirt so why are you acting cocky?

Who said I was cocky. My Z coordinate is roughly 8000 from yours
[/quote]

Apparently you’ve moved away?[/quote]

I’m moving back to civilization with Chris. I can’t take the slow life.

Read full topic

It might not be apparent to some but the server glitched last night, alot of things were messed up in the process, and i witnessed it all myself, chests crashing players, previous blocks placed are gone in random increments, and items missing.

Wrench_King’s inventory was glitched and he is unable to login without his client crashing instantly, not minecraft login, the /login command on the server itself.

i was infact there when it happened luckily i was not glitched but this is infact true[/quote]

In the glitch one of my items was turned into a stack of 33 iron axes
